dcterms:description: This dataset comprises 4.5M parallel sentence pairs. During SFT, we randomly sample 100k sentence pairs for fine-tuning LLM. Consistent with Ma et al. (2020), we use newstest2013 as the validation set and newstest2015 as the test set.
dcterms:title: WMT15 German→English (De→En)

dcterms:creator: Mattia A. Di Gangi
Roldano Cattoni
Luisa Bentivogli
Matteo Negri
Marco Turchi
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 230k samples. Similarly, we randomly sample 100k samples from the training set for fine-tuning LLM. We use dev set for validation and tst-COMMON set for the testing.
dcterms:title: MuST-C English→German (En→De)
